name: Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 12: The Masters
name_original: Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 12: The Masters
description: Start your journey down the “Road to the Masters” with Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 12: The Masters.  For the first time in franchise history, players will be able to experience the rich history and tradition of the Masters Tournament.  Rely on the advice of your caddie to strategize and focus your game while feeling the intensity of the PGA TOUR season.
